Services

Services can be modified to the need of the client.

>

Entire house will be swept/vacuumed, mopped, disinfected, dusted (high and low).Bathrooms will be cleaned(toilet,tub/shower,floors) We will make any beds that need to be made and fix any couch pillow or blankets. We will clean dishes and counters as well. This service can be customized

Your choice of room(s). Includes swept/vacuumed, mopped, disinfected, dusted (high and low) and if applicable beds made.

Will shampoo one or as many as needed. This service requires that we get a 48 hour notice before service.

Clean counters, wipe off all appliances, sweep/vacuumed, mopped, disinfected, dusted (high and low) and dishes.

Clean and wipe down walls, swept/vacuumed, mopped, disinfected, dusted (high and low) and bathroom cleaned and disinfected. With this service we require to be free of most stuff

Schedule a cleaning daily, weekly, monthly, annually. completely customizable.

Entire house will be swept/vacuumed, mopped, disinfected, dusted (high and low).Bathrooms will be cleaned(toilet,tub/shower,floors) We will make any beds that need to be made and fix any couch pillow or blankets. We will clean dishes and counters as well. We will also get into the stuff never touched. We will move all couches and clean under. Vaccuum all couches, clean all baseboards,clean all grout, all glass and mirrors. This service can be customized

Clean after any project big or small and as many areas as needed.

Just need help cleaning out the garage we can do that as well.
